alert.note: Alert for Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Coleman County through 530 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Coleman, or near Silver Valley, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coleman, Valera, Silver Valley, Echo and Lake Coleman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
